Stakeholders

Some of the stakeholders of antivirus can be shareholders of the company, customers, and employees. All of these stakeholders will get affected by the functionality of the antivirus software.

Social and Ethical Significance

Reliability and integrity

Some of the antivirus software works better than others. Sometimes they might make false alarms, or could slow down your system. The best antivirus softwares are “easy to use, low on resources, updated frequently, and can use a multi-pronged attack against the newest sophisticated malware.”

security

Since antivirus software secures the user by protecting people from getting infected by malware.

it system

Mobile devices, tablets, and computers are the main IT systems for antivirus softwares.

Areas of social and ethical impact

Business/employment and education

If the antivirus software is not working properly and malware hacks into a school system or a business computer, this will be a big problem and problems such as data breach could occur. The area of social and ethical impact of antivirus softwares are not only limited to Business/employment and education. It could also impact areas such as politics/government and home/leisure.
